#summary Uri's for Web Services.

=1.2.x=

==AdapterService==

===Meta Data===
{{{
/{scope}/{app}/binding    GET              -> XElement
/{scope}/{app}/binding    POST    XElement -> Response
/{scope}/{app}/dictionary GET              -> DataDictionary
/{scope}/{app}/manifest   GET              -> Manifest
/{scope}/{app}/mapping    GET              -> Mapping (1.2.x)
/{scope}/{app}/mapping    POST    XElement -> Response
/datalayers               GET              -> List<String>
/scopes                   GET              -> List<Scope>
/scopes                   POST List<Scope> -> Response
/version                  GET              -> String
}}}

===Dynamic Data===
{{{
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}?format=xml/dto/rdf      GET            -> XElement
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}?format=xml/dto/rdf      POST  XElement -> Response
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/{id}?format=xml/dto/rdf GET            -> XElement
}}}

===Differencing Support===
{{{
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/dti                     POST dxRequest -> XElement
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/dto                     POST dxRequest -> XElement
}}}

dxRequest = Manifest + Identifiers + hashAlgorithm

===Triple Store===
{{{
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/delete  GET          -> Reponse
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/refresh GET          -> Reponse
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/pull    POST Request -> Reponse
/{scope}/{app}/delete          GET          -> Reponse
}}}

=2.0.0=

==Adapter==
{{{
/adapter/{scope}/{app}/binding    GET            -> XDocument
/adapter/{scope}/{app}/binding    POST XDocument -> Response
/adapter/{scope}/{app}/dictionary GET            -> DataDictionary
/adapter/{scope}/{app}/mapping    GET            -> Mapping (1.2.x)
/adapter/{scope}/{app}/mapping    POST XDocument -> Response
/adapter/datalayers		          GET            -> DataLayers
/adapter/scopes                   GET            -> Scopes
/adapter/scopes                   POST    Scopes -> Response
/adapter/version                  GET            -> Version
}}}

==Data=
{{{
/data/{scope}/{app}/{graph}?format=xml/rdf      GET              -> XDocument
/data/{scope}/{app}/{graph}?format=xml/rdf      POST   XDocument -> Response
/data/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/{id}?format=xml/rdf GET              -> XDocument
/data/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/{id}                DELETE           -> Response
}}}

==DTO==
{{{
/dto/{scope}/{app}/{graph}           GET                        -> DataTransferIndices
/dto/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/page      POST   DataTransferIndices -> DataTransferObjects
/dto/{scope}/{app}/{graph}           POST   DataTransferObjects -> Response
/dto/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/{id}      GET                        -> DataTransferObjects
/dto/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/{id}      DELETE                     -> Response
/dto/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/diff      POST           Manifest    -> DataTransferIndices
/dto/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/diff/page POST           PageRequest -> DataTransferObjects
/dto/{scope}/{app}/manifest          GET                        -> Manifest
}}}

PageRequest = Manifest + DataTransferIndices

==Facade==
{{{
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/delete  GET          -> Reponse
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/refresh GET          -> Reponse
/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/pull    POST Request -> Reponse
/{scope}/{app}/delete          GET          -> Reponse
}}}

---Java---

==ESBProxy==
{{{
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}?format=xml/dto/rdf      GET                        -> XDocument
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}?format=xml/dto/rdf      POST             XDocument -> Response
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/{id}?format=xml/dto/rdf GET                        -> XDocument
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/{id}                    DELETE                     -> Response
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/data                    GET                        -> DataTransferIndices
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/data                    POST   DataTransferIndices -> DataTransferObjects
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/data                    POST   DataTransferObjects -> Response
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/data/{id}               GET                        -> DataTransferObjects
/esb/{scope}/{app}/{graph}/data/{id}               DELETE                     -> Response
/esb/{scope}/exchanges/{id}                        GET                        -> DataTransferIndices
/esb/{scope}/exchanges/{id}                        POST   DataTransferIndices -> DataTransferObjects
/esb/directory                                     GET                        -> Directory
}}}
